question: At the restaurant they ordered 3 cookies.1 cookie was taken away. Fill the blank boxes to complete the subtraction statement.
They ordered 4 drinks. 1 drink was spilled so it was taken away.Fill in the boxes to complete the statement.
They had 8 pieces of cake. 3 were taken away. Fill the blank boxes to complete the subtraction statement.
They had 7 slices of pizzas. 4 slices were taken away.Fill the blank boxes to complete the subtraction statement.
On their table there were  9 desserts. 5 were taken away.Fill in the blank boxes to complete the statement.
The restaurant had 29 menu items. 4 items got spoiled. They are left with 25 items.Fill in the box to complete the statement.
A restaurant had 24 different desserts. 19 desserts were taken away. They are left with 5 desserts.Fill in the box to complete the statement
A friend got 35 photos from the trip. 5 photos got blurred. He is left with 30 clear photos.Fill in the box to complete the statement.
The group collected 25 souvenirs from their trip. 8 souvenirs were broken. They have 17 intact souvenirs to display.Fill in the box to complete the statement.
They remembered that on their trip they made 19 sandwiches. 6 were damaged. They were left with 13 sandwiches.Fill in the box to complete the statement.
